verbs.description: The press [V: is] simplistically treating South Carolina Congressman Mark Sanford 's Tuesday Republican primary loss as exemplifying the price one pays if one does n't learn , per the Associated Press , " not to cross ( President Donald ) Trump . " A closer look at Sanford 's history illustrates that this is a classic case of sudden media respect which ignores why Sanford was so vulnerable .
